channel.title: iDRAC7 on MyThinkPond
channel.description: Recent content in iDRAC7 on MyThinkPond

item.title: Mac OS X iDRAC7 FileNotFoundException .java/deployment/security/trusted.certs
item.description: When you connect with a Dell iDRAC virtual console you may encounter the following exception on a Mac OS X FileNotFoundException ~/.java/deployment/security/trusted.certs Here is a simple fix for this: mkdir -p ~/.java/deployment/security cp ~/Library/Application\ Support/Oracle/Java/Deployment/security/trusted.certs ~/.java/deployment/security/ Cheers.
